result.eng: Anybody looking for a job in Raidió na Gaeltachta should speak good Irish.

result.eng: We want to get a bus from Galway to Ros an Mhíl to get the boat to Inis Mór.
result.ga: Táimid ag iarraidh bus a fháil ó Ghaillimh go Ros an Mhíl leis an mbád a fháil go hInis Mór
result.orig: Táimid ag iarraidh bus a fháil ó Ghaillimh go Ros an Mhíl leis an mbád a fháil go hInis Mór

result.ponchtml: Táimid ag iarraiḋ bus a ḟáil ó Ġailliṁ go Ros an Ṁíl leis an mbád a ḟáil go hInis MórWe want to get a bus from Galway to Ros an Mhíl to get the boat to Inis Mór.

result.eng: We want to get a bus today, if we can.

result.eng: But if you are attempting to buy a pullover with a hood with something written in Irish on it, An Spailpín Fánach is the best place to go shopping.

result.orig: Ach má tá tú ag iarraidh geansaí le cochall a cheannacht le rud eicínt scríofa i nGaeilge air is é An Spailpín Fánach an áit is fearr le dul ag siopadóireacht

result.ponchtml: Aċ má tá tú ag iarraiḋ geansaí le coċall a ċeannaċt le rud eicínt scríofa i nGaeilge air is é An Spailpín Fánaċ an áit is fearr le dul ag siopadóireaċtBut if you are attempting to buy a pullover with a hood with something written in Irish on it, An Spailpín Fánach is the best place to go shopping.

result.eng: I am trying to say something to you.
result.ga: Tá mé ag iarraidh rud a rá leat
result.orig: Tá mé ag iarraidh rud a rá leat
result.html: Tá mé ag iarraidh rud a rá leatI am trying to say something to you.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag iarraiḋ rud a rá leatI am trying to say something to you.

result.eng: They were trying not to hurt the animal in the head.
result.ga: Bhí siad ag iarraidh gan an t-ainmhí a ghoin sa cheann
result.orig: Bhí siad ag iarraidh gan an t-ainmhí a ghoin sa cheann

result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad ag iarraiḋ gan an t-ainṁí a ġoin sa ċeannThey were trying not to hurt the animal in the head.

result.eng: I looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?
result.ga: D'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith An mise an t-aon neach beo anseo
result.orig: D'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith An mise an t-aon neach beo anseo
result.html: D'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith An mise an t-aon neach beo anseoI looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?
result.ponchtml: D'ḟéaċ mé go grinn ag iarraiḋ cor a ḟeiceáil cor beag ar biṫ An mise an t-aon neaċ beo anseoI looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?

result.eng: I am asking you to be my bridesmaid.
result.ga: Tá mé ag iarraidh ort seasamh liom ar lá mo phósta

result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag iarraiḋ ort seasaṁ liom ar lá mo ṗóstaI am asking you to be my bridesmaid.

result.eng: For a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.
result.ga: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oiread

result.ponchtml: Níor ceadaíoḋ aċ correitilt sa tír go ceann seaċtaine eile agus ar ndóiġ ba ḃeag duine a ḃí ag iarraiḋ eitilt aċ oireadFor a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.

result.eng: You would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].

result.eng: A microblogging service of its kind [ie Twitter] is probably better suited to a busy person who wants to share his opinions.

result.ponchtml: Seans gur fearr a ḟóireann seirḃís ṁicreaḃlagála dá ċineál don duine gnóṫaċ atá ag iarraiḋ tuairimí a noċtaḋA microblogging service of its kind [ie Twitter] is probably better suited to a busy person who wants to share his opinions.
